member.name: D2D1_FACTORY_TYPE
member.summary: Specifies whether Direct2D provides synchronization for an and the resources it creates, so that they may be safely accessed from multiple threads.

member.name: D2D1_FACTORY_TYPE.D2D1_FACTORY_TYPE_SINGLE_THREADED
member.summary: No synchronization is provided for accessing or writing to the factory or the objects it creates. If the factory or the objects are called from multiple threads, it is up to the application to provide access locking.

member.name: D2D1_FACTORY_TYPE.D2D1_FACTORY_TYPE_MULTI_THREADED
member.summary: Direct2D provides synchronization for accessing and writing to the factory and the objects it creates, enabling safe access from multiple threads.
